授業方法: This course will be conducted online through a balance of on-demand independent learning and real-time synchronous Zoom sessions.   On weeks with on-demand independent learning, students will work individually to complete textbook tasks and submit answers using Google Forms. During weeks with Zoom sessions, students will work in groups to complete tasks and manage extended discussions based on textbook preparation. You will be required to lead and help manage group work and small group discussions. Students who are not able to attend Zoom sessions will be required to use Flipgrid to upload video responses to the discussion questions.
